net.tinyos.message
Interface MessageListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
AndroidLocalNodeAdapter
public interface MessageListener

MessageListener interface (listen to tinyos messages).

An interface for listening to messages built from net.tinyos.message.Message

Version:
1, 15 Jul 2002
Author:
David Gay

Method Summary
 void messageReceived(int to, Message m)
          This method is called to signal message reception.
 

Method Detail

messageReceived

void messageReceived(int to,
                     Message m)
This method is called to signal message reception. to is the destination of message m.

Parameters:
to - the destination of the message (Note: to is only valid when using TOSBase base stations)
m - the received message
